In England, in the seven days to 02 December, there were 273,512 new confirmed cases (483.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 November, there were 249,760 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 10% (23,752 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 December is 8,957,091 (15,839.2 cases per 100,000 population).
